mapper.insert: insert into hbq_route_config(route_id, uri, predicates, filters, route_order) values (#{id}, #{uri}, #{predicates}, #{filters}, #{order})
mapper.select: select route_id AS "id", uri AS "uri", predicates AS "predicates", filters AS "filters", route_order AS "order" from hbq_route_config order by route_id
select route_id AS "id", uri AS "uri", predicates AS "predicates", filters AS "filters", route_order AS "order" from hbq_route_config where route_id = #{id}
